怎样才能参见游艇聚会 呢 ?

sentences.en: I've always lived in a houseboat.
Philip: I've always lived in a houseboat. I was born in one.

sentences.en: The houseboat can also be used as a combined home and office.

sentences.en: Then a houseboat will take us to the waterfalls just where they float in the river.
